<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Return all the servers available to the client making the API
request, including servers the user has access to as a subuser.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
